trans-unit.source: Enables setting message-level security properties on the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 可在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> 繫結上設定訊息層級的安全性屬性。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessed from the binding by means of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding.Security%2A> property, which returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding.Security%2A> 屬性 (此屬性傳回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity> 物件)，從繫結中存取這個物件。

trans-unit.source: This object has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity.Message%2A> property that provides a reference to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> object.
trans-unit.target: 此物件有一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity.Message%2A> 屬性，此屬性提供一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> 物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the algorithm suite used for security messages at the SOAP level.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於 SOAP 層級之安全性訊息的演算法套件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" /> setting for messages sent over the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" /> 繫結所傳送訊息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding" /> 設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> defines of a variety of algorithms such as Canonicalization, Digest, KeyWrap, Signature, Encryption, and KeyDerivation algorithms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> 會定義各種不同的演算法，例如標準化、摘要式、KeyWrap、簽章、加密和 KeyDerivation 演算法。

trans-unit.source: This property is most relevant when working with a platform that uses a set of algorithms different than the default.
trans-unit.target: 當使用的平台是利用一組和預設值不同的演算法時，這個屬性的存在就非常重要。

trans-unit.source: You should be aware of the strengths and weaknesses of the relevant algorithms when making modifications to this property.
trans-unit.target: 在修改這個屬性時，您應該了解相關演算法的優點和缺點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType" /> security setting for messages sent over the MSMQ transport.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定透過 MSMQ 傳輸傳送之訊息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType" /> 安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType" /> security setting for messages sent over the MSMQ transport.
trans-unit.target: 透過 MSMQ 傳輸傳送的訊息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType" /> 安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以設定為下列其中一個值：

trans-unit.source: **None**: This allows the service to interact with anonymous clients.
trans-unit.target: **無**： 這會允許服務與匿名用戶端互動。

trans-unit.source: Neither the service nor the client requires a credential.
trans-unit.target: 服務和用戶端都不需要認證。

trans-unit.source: **Windows**: This allows the SOAP exchanges to be under the authenticated context of a Windows credential.
trans-unit.target: **Windows**： 這可讓 SOAP 交換加入 Windows 認證的已驗證的內容。

trans-unit.source: This always performs Kerberos-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如此一定會執行 Kerberos 驗證。

trans-unit.source: **UserName**: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using a UserName credential.
trans-unit.target: **使用者名稱**： 這可讓服務要求用戶端會使用 UserName 認證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: This credential must be specified using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個認證必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 類別來指定。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] does not support sending a password digest or deriving keys using password and using such keys for message security.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 不支援傳送密碼摘要，或是使用密碼衍生金鑰，甚至對訊息安全性使用該金鑰。

trans-unit.source: As such, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] enforces that the exchange is secured when using UserName credentials.
trans-unit.target: 這麼一來，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會在使用 UserName 認證時強制保護交換。

trans-unit.source: This mode requires that the service certificate be specified on the client using `ClientCredential` behavior and `serviceCertificate`:
trans-unit.target: 此模式需要使用用戶端上指定服務憑證`ClientCredential`行為和`serviceCertificate`:

trans-unit.source: `Certificate`: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using a certificate.
trans-unit.target: `Certificate`：這會讓服務要求用戶端使用憑證進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The client credential in this case must be specified using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class or `ClientCredentials` behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此案例中的用戶端認證必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 類別或 `ClientCredentials` 行為來指定。

trans-unit.source: The service credential in this case must be specified using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class or `ClientCredentials` behavior by specifying the `serviceCertificate`.
trans-unit.target: 此案例中的服務認證必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 類別或藉由指定 `ClientCredentials` 以使用 `serviceCertificate` 行為來指定。

trans-unit.source: `InfoCard`: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using an InfoCard.
trans-unit.target: `InfoCard`：這會讓服務要求用戶端使用 InfoCard 來進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The `serviceCertificate` must be provisioned in the `ClientCredential` behavior.
trans-unit.target: `serviceCertificate` 行為中必須提供 `ClientCredential`。

trans-unit.source: The Certificate credential for the `MessageSecurityOverMsmq` is relevant only when the security mode is set to `Both` or `Message`.
trans-unit.target: 只有當安全性模式設定為 `MessageSecurityOverMsmq` 或 `Both` 時，才與 `Message` 的 Certificate 認證有關。
